titles.title: I can hear my Saviour calling

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can hear my Saviour calling,
I can hear my Saviour calling,
I can hear my Saviour calling,
I'll go with Him,
with Him all the way.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll go with Him through the garden,
I'll go with Him through the garden,
I'll go with Him through the garden,
I'll go with Him,
with Him all the way.
